english.segment1: Pop bang boom pow. kill somebody and you take a bow. Naughty (words), naughty (words). mouth full of potty (words)
english.segment2: You stretch and you flex. and you swin your S.E.X. I try to talk about G.O.D. why you wanna censor me?
english.segment3: I'm the salt of the earth. the city on a hill. My light's twice as bright. I'm gonna show you something real
english.segment4: So don't (don't), don't (don't), don't (don't). Don't censor me
english.segment5: We scream we shout. we just wanna let it out. No fuss and no cuss. you still try to censor us. Only one word shakes the earth. only one word holds the worth. One word G.O.D. why you wanna censor me?
english.segment6: I'm the salt of the earth. the city on a hill. My light's twice as bright. I'm gonna show you something real
english.segment7: So don't (don't), don't (don't), don't (don't). Don't censor me
english.segment8: Don't censor me. You can't shut me up!. So don't even try!
english.segment9: I'm the salt of the earth. the city on a hill. My light's twice as bright. I'm gonna show you something real
english.segment10: So don't (don't), don't (don't), don't (don't). Don't censor me.
